experience.description: Engineered full-stack e-commerce web applications and led technology migrations.
responsibilities: Engineered full-stack e-commerce web applications using Java, Svelte, Spring Boot, SOAP, and REST API
Led technology migration from Angular to Svelte, building the application from the ground up, resulting in a 45% reduction in build size of web components
Improved application performance by optimizing backend processing through multithreading and caching, achieving a 66% reduction in processing time
Developed UIaaS (User Interface as a Service) web components and backend REST APIs for full-tech product search with filtering, add-to-cart, pagination, and bulk document downloads for 500+ products
Implemented ESAPI (Enterprise Security API) library to mitigate XSS vulnerabilities, enhancing cybersecurity resilience

achievements.description: Reduction in build size after Angular to Svelte migration
Reduction in processing time through backend optimization

experience.description: Teaching Assistant for C++ programming course, mentoring 100+ students.
responsibilities: Led hands-on sessions demonstrating OpenCV techniques for image classification and manipulation using C++
Mentored over 100 students in modern C++ features and best coding practices
Hosted office hours and guided students through advanced C++ concepts including pointers, STL, OOP, UML, and multithreading
Graded weekly programming assignments and exercises via Linux server and Replit

achievements.description: Students mentored in modern C++ features

experience.description: Teaching Assistant for full-stack development course covering React, Express, and MongoDB.
responsibilities: Hosted office hours and guided students on full-stack development with React (TypeScript), Express, and MongoDB
Mentored student groups through sprint reviews and provided feedback on user stories and project deliverables
Developed starter code and created database schema design for assignments
Created test suites with Jest and Cypress to ensure backend APIs and frontend components functioned consistently and reliably
